entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API] Add client result support to Java client #41777
  • dotnet watch on macOS throws error looking for exe #41776
  • Null results not handled correctly in Java client #41775
  • EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider Misses Route Parameters #41773
  • [dotnet-watch] Experience improvements for injecting the scripts into the document #41772
  • HTTP Error 503.0 - Server has been shutdown The service is unavailable. Most likely causes: An invalid identity in the application pool could cause this error. The application pool is no longer running because of configuration or reaching application failure limits. The concurrent application request limit was reached. #41771
  • IIS In Process aspnetcore process failing to start under load #41770
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Trimming] MVC #41767
  • [Trimming] Localization #41766

Closed

  • With "Do not use top-level statements" checked, in Blazor WebAssembly App/ Blazor Server App/gRPC, the namespace is "Company.WebApplication1" rather than the solution name. #41529
    6.0.x
  • Backport template fixes to 6.0.xxx #41519
    6.0.x
  • Integer Overflow Causing HTTP1 Connections to Fail in Kestrel #41756
    7.0-preview5
  • Allow specifying authentication schemes where anti-forgery checks are (not) required #41759
  • OnParameterSetAsync is triggered when using a CascadingParameter and NavigationManager #33785
    Discussions
  • define an interface for HubConnectionContext for signalR #41709
  • Move Rate Liming Abstractions/APIs to dotnet/runtime #37385
    7.0-preview4
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #38267
    6.0.x
  • Component Governance alerts of eventsource for signalr package in npm #41729
  • TaskResultExecutor is never used by ActionMethodExecutor #40364
    7.0-preview4
  • css isolation compiler warnings for incorrect css syntax #41751
  • SDL signoff requirements - please enable additional C/C++ compiler warnings #40525
    7.0-preview5
  • [.Net 6.0] Sampler does not receive the correct ParentId when enabling ActivitySource listener for `Microsoft.AspNetCore` #37471
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Caching StackExchangeRedis throws exception when using Twemproxy #41320
    7.0-preview5
  • Blazor Server execption on publish after updating to .net 7 #41712

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove outdated comments HostingApplicationDiagnostics #41778
    area-runtime
  • Add SignalR client results to Java client #41774
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Add logging to M.E.Caching.StackExchangeRedis #41769
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [6.0] Initialize Activity with parent ID #41765
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix client results with Hub<T> IHubContext #41763
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview5
  • Fix Integer Overflow in Header Processing #41757
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop, 7.0-preview5
  • fix allocation issue caused by ordering of MVC result executors for Task results #41108
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview5
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Fall back to using old command when GetServer isn't supported #41649
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    blocked, * NO MERGE *, area-web-frameworks
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc
  • Make SignalR Redis test thread-safe #41564
    area-signalr
  • Fix the RedirectHandler (in Mvc.Testing) for relative URIs #41742
    area-mvc, community-contribution
